description:
The investment seeks to track the investment results (before fees and expenses) of the Dynamic Networking IntellidexSM Index.
 The fund generally will invest at least 90% of its total assets in common stocks of networking companies that comprise the underlying intellidex. The underlying intellidex was composed of common stocks of 30 U.S. networking companies. These are companies that are principally engaged in the development, manufacture, sale or distribution of products, services or technologies that support the flow of electronic information, including voice, data, images and commercial transactions. It is non-diversified.
